contentfulPagePressRelease.title: National Reading Campaign Resumes With Fun-Filled And Educational Reading Activities

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Families in Qatar are welcome to enjoy a number of fun-filled and educational events with the launch of Qatar Foundation’s (QF) National Reading Campaign summer activities.

Exciting National Reading Campaign activities include storytelling sessions, jigsaw puzzles, and scrabble games, and are part of the Qatar Summer Festival being held at the Doha Exhibition and Convention Centre (DECC). The festival will run for the entire month of August, from 1pm to 11pm on weekdays, and until midnight on Fridays.

The National Reading Campaign strives to cultivate a love of reading from an early age, while fostering a lifelong pursuit of knowledge.

pageContext.title: National Reading Campaign Resumes With Fun-Filled And Educational Reading Activities
